tutorials.title: Transparent Data Redaction Overview
tutorials.description: In this lab you will create a realm to protect sensitve data in an application schema

tutorials.title: TDE : Lab3 (Create Master Key)
tutorials.description: Learn how to leverage the Operations Control feature of Database Vault to protect pluggable databases from container admins
